reviewText: I haven't watched everything on this DVD, but it does have many episodes of FURY on it. I grew up watching FURY every week - I loved that horse program!
Yes .I bought the DVD for my dad. He loves horses. He is 91 years old and enjoys anything about horses.
A bit disappointed,didn't realize the shows were so old. Quality of film was fair, episodes I watched were ok, but a bit slow.
Those captured by the spirit of the horse will enjoy this!
I bought it for a gift
I have granddaughters in love with horses and this was great for them.
